title: Tortella (plant)
text:
Tortella is a genus of <a href="moss">moss</a> belonging to the family <a href="Pottiaceae">Pottiaceae</a>.
The genus was first described by <a href="Karl%20M%C3%BCller%20%28bryologist%29">Karl Müller</a>.
The genus has <a href="cosmopolitan%20distribution">cosmopolitan distribution</a>.
Species:
